website_summaries.verdict: Stiff and sturdy with a surprisingly cozy fit and a wide range of charming pastel colors, these ice skates are a great option for kids taking their first steps on the ice.
pros: Available in 5 colors and a wide range of sizes
cons: It is recommended that buyers select a model a half shoe size smaller than their regular shoe size for the best fit

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loves them and fit perfect (and comfortable) on her feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 year old girl ( size 5 /ladies ). She absolutely loves them and fit perfect (and comfortable) on her feet..The skates come already sharpened so we use them right out of the box. She is just a beginner skater but is confident with the skates, We have used the skates for about more than 40 hours already. We dont have experience with other brands skates so can't compare. ( I'm sure other $200 or $20 skates may be better as comfort and quality )
customer_reviews.author: Bofa

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: To small. I understand skates are suppose to mold your feet but these are so uncomfortable. To much ankle support. Good for toddlers but not for an adult. You can not even perform simple spins and jumps with these and mine did not come sharpened. I also ordered the ones with pink insides and the dye came off on the laces. Luckily I have my old pair still which I need for work. :( They were really cute so that's for the two stars.
customer_reviews.author: shyneice mayeux

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yearold is in lessons and loves these. The work great on the ice and are made perfectly with no skuffs or marks. The pink is perfect too!!!! They are absolutely perfect for practices and her figure skating! Will probably be ofdering more as her foot sizes grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stiff boot for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff boot, which should be fine for beginning daughter. Had blades sharpened at the rink. I ordered her street size shoe and fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: I prchased these through prime yesterday and they arrived same day! My daughter is 9, she wears a 1 street shoe. I ordered a 2 and they are big, but will do. They are sooo stiff!!! Like a statue! I could not get the ankle snug around her tiny leg because it honestly doesn't move! She has a private lesson today so hoping they are comfy on the ice and support her despite being loose. They do look cute, but we're hoping for more than cute :)
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Love these skates. Have used them about 3 times already. I needed skates to support my ankles and were comfortable as well. The padding on these are great. The only complaintI have is that I bought them a half size larger and they're a little big. It doesn't bother me whenI skate however. I wear an 8.5 shoe size and bought a 9. I would've been better off with an 8. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am just a mom who likes to ice skate with her children after their ice skating lessons. Previously, I've either had cheaper skates which I owned or rental skates. The first time I wore these I could not believe the difference! They are so comfortable and glide so well on the ice. They make ice skating much more enjoyable. I'm so glad I finally spent the money on a high quality pair of skates. I should have done this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Levine

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The ankle of the skates are very sturdy and stiff and the look of the skates is nice, however I fear the quality isn’t great. The shoelace hooks keep snapping. When we last took the skates to be repaired for this issue, the man said all the hooks would eventually need to be replaced because they were made from a flimsy metal. Now here I am again needing another repair because another hook snapped.
customer_reviews.author: MV Martin

customer_reviews.title: Faux fur flop
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the look of these, especially with the faux fur fleece. Pretty uncomfortable to wear though. Maybe it's the extra layer of fleece inside but the vinyl outer material is so thick and stiff. I found it impossible to tighten the laces as much as I wanted around my ankle and lower leg. The laces are cheap and way too short. I had to skip some lace hooks at the top in order to tie a bow. I'm returning and buying a more classic figure skate.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter's. I ordered their current shoe sizes versus 1 down and they fit perfectly. Great look and support. The only downside were the laces were a little thin and short but can't complain. They are very nice ice skates for the price. They do not come with blade guards but they do come with plastic blade covers. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aletha Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates..
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter who is just learning to skate, she's 5. Beautiful fit and they look professional. I think they kept her steady on the ice as she was skating all around with ease. I will buy them again next year :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she didn't complain about them so they must be good. Shes in between a 3 and 4 so I ordered both sizes and ended up returning the 3. The blades came plenty sharp for skating around the rink. The eyelets held up just fine despite that being a common complaint.
customer_reviews.author: slaw82

customer_reviews.title: Hard to say...
customer_reviews.text: These were very cute in the description and photos - were advertised as new, no box, so the price was a bit lower. When we received them, they had clearly been worn as the fleece was matted and there were nicks on the leather and dirt on the blades. I imagine if they had been truly new they would have been fine. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful! I’ve been super excited about them
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my skates! They are beautiful! I’ve been super excited about them, I’m using ice skating as a new cardio for myself! Well the skates are extremely comfortable! But they do need different laces bc the laces on them aren’t long enough. They also need sharpening when you receive them! With sizing I normally wear a 7.5/8 and ordered a seven they fit perfect but I wish I would’ve gone with an eight so I could wear thicker socks if needed. I will be trying the skates out on the ice Friday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute skate, damages easily
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the look of the skate compared to others. They fit nice and were easy to get used to. However, two hooks have broken off and instructor does not want my daughter to continue wearing the skate. only lasted 6 wears. One hook broke at 2nd wear and other hook broke at the 6th. Not reliable skate.
customer_reviews.author: JohnP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: True to size. But being a figure skater, I know the rule of figure skates always go down a size because they do run a little large or wide especially for a toddler. Perfect toddler skates But I would get your feet measured. Before so, you know exactly what size you should buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Quality fine but looks leave a little to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be fine, but very bulky, like a rollerblading boot ball the slim streamlined ice skates. And though I thought they looked great, when she wears them with more advanced skaters she looks babyish with the bulk and not tan heel like everyone else has. Wouldn’t recommend based on asthmatics only.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Russo

customer_reviews.title: low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Tie hooks are breaking off. Quality is low. The seller said that my warranty is expired after 6 months. Are those skates supposed to last only 6 months? Avoid this brand and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jirka C

customer_reviews.title: Superior kids skates
customer_reviews.text: I have repeatedly bought this style Jackson skate, never lets me down. Soft enough the kids don’t complain about their feet yet durable enough to use. They can’t learn to skate and hop around if you can’t keep them on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: MommaO

customer_reviews.title: Laces are too short
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong size, so I gave them to my boyfriend. The company includes laces, but they're way too short. On his feet, the boots do not lace all the way up, which could result in broken ankles if he were trying jumps or other intermediate moves. Luckily, he skates recreationally, and the only issue he experiences because of this is falling a lot. They're not bad skates, themselves, but be prepared to buy longer laces. The laces they include could easily get someone seriously injured.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda Dixon

customer_reviews.title: OMG SO WORTH IT! I LOVE THEM 😍💛
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 7 1/2 for almost everything and I was scared that it wouldn’t fit but so far I love the ankle support and the fact they came in a day :) they’re fluffy like genuine Sherpa for snow and support my (very wobbly and prone to spraining) ankles soooo glad I went for it rather than a figure skating pair-
customer_reviews.author: Isa H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 12 year old daughter. Very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old daughter. Very well constructed but unfortunately a full size too small. I will be reordering the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is tall and wears a size 11 in women's shoes, so I bought the same size in these ice skates. They are pretty and fit her wonderfully. She says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D

customer_reviews.title: Good but not sharpened
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these skates and overall they are great. They look good and fit well. I haven’t had a chance to go to a rink yet so I can’t speak for its performance. My only issue is that they came unsharpened. The box and online said they were factory sharpened but these skates are definitely not sharp. There is little to no hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nuttree

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Got those for my 4 year old. She is progressing quickly, and I'm sure a good pair of skates help her progress.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfy....
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff as to be expected. Footbed of boot could have more padding. They look like they would be all comfy and cozy but it is like having cement tied to the bottom of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Farver

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: Came sharp enough to use without a sharpening. Good ankle support for beginners. Ran true to size. Happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Laces too short, otherwise adequate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who has had some skating experience, but not much, finds these satisfactory. They are hard to lace, mostly because the supplied laces are too short, but also the skates are rather stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started skating and we needed something for her at practices. These are great and fit perfect. We have received a lot of compliments on how beautiful the skates are as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my daughter and she loved them ! The soft insides kept her from blisters on her legs where they lace up
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this skates after looking for some skates that will be good as their first one as our daughter began her skating classes, she is happy, we think its a good price and value you get.
customer_reviews.author: RAUL Gallardo Flore

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the purple lining. Looks very solid too! Only complain is that it comes with non-sharpened. Make sure you sharpen these before you use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives support for skating
customer_reviews.text: Only used once and it has been a while since I have skated which is why I gave it a 4 for comfort. Fir the money nice skate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the packaging?!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for the Jackson because the quality is really good for the beginners, like my daughters. That is why I ordered again for the 3rd time. BUT this 3rd time? I am DIS-APPOINT with the PACKAGING ! It seems it doesn't nt handled well. Thankfully the skating shoes are ok and doesnt t need to return.
customer_reviews.author: mitchermelo

customer_reviews.title: Ready for winter
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable....snug fit that seems to be accurate to size
customer_reviews.author: michael hardy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money but don’t forget to sharpen
customer_reviews.text: We definitely got our money worth on these. Keep in mind they’ll still need to be sharpened which is another $20-$25
customer_reviews.author: Tina W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates as a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter needed new skates and decided to try theses, she not only loves them but improved her skating abilities! Sturdy and well manufactured! Super ankle support also!
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The clasps where the shoe laces tie break off easily. Not at all sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome buy. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Mine came with nice long laces. Beautiful skates.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haws

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen many other skaters with the same skates who bought them for up to 800 so getting mine pre-owned for 44 dollars and they didn’t even look like they’d been warn. I love them and have had no problems with them with constant use over the past months. I did nick them during falls but that is just a me problem nothing against the skates.
customer_reviews.author: Maryana

customer_reviews.title: Good starter skate for beginner skater.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skate. Blades are pre-sharpened, very sturdy boot. A lot of padding around the ankle. Good starter skate for beginner skater.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Mercado

customer_reviews.title: All new items have a "break in" period.
customer_reviews.text: Good looks and quality. It does not feel comfortable, but it is brand new. In time hopefully my daughter will get used to it and shoe will take on my daughter's feet.
customer_reviews.author: grillmaster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young skaters
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my 4 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be brand new
customer_reviews.text: This was marked as “like new” but appear to be brand new & the person who sharpened them said that they had never been sharpened before/original guides were still in place. I haven’t had a chance to get them on the ice yet, and am excited to try them this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: UsesAmazonoften

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for beginner
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is well made, and my kid love it. The size is exactly the same as the shoe size & suitable for beginning learner.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them, took others advice and ordered two sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: chuck b.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Skates are extremely uncomfortable at the ankle, feels like they are made of wood. Even without tying shoelaces it felt as if my ankle was in a wooden boot. I have a very thin ankle so that it is not a weight problem. The skates just have minimal padding inside. I immediately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice skates. Solid quality and no damage or visible signs of wear after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon F.

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these skates for my granddaughter. She loves them! Used your shoe chart and They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bobdi

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates. She's a beginner and they work perfect for her. We did have to get them sharpened at the pro shop. Only cost$7
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Densmore

customer_reviews.title: Good quality skates
customer_reviews.text: These ice skates are so cute and pretty true to size. My 3 year-old who just began to learn how to skate loved them. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Broke after light use
customer_reviews.text: Lace hook broke after only a few uses. Worked well up until that. Dissapointed that only light use caused hook to break. Hoping to hear from seller about issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Measured according to the guidelines and ended with a perfect fit. Great skate, especially for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality is impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These skates fit well and come very sharp from new.
customer_reviews.author: kjr

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and preforming skates!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 y/o skater loves these skates. I hope they can take to the next level. Look just as described!!
customer_reviews.author: xamula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas for my daughter. I got them a little bigger since she’s in a growth spurt. But they fit her well and she says they’re very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dieselgoalie

customer_reviews.title: Good sk8ts
customer_reviews.text: The top lace holders seem to bend and have to be bent back into place. Worried they might break off soon. Other than that they are good for the $$
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Ice skates
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, beautiful, and comfortable! I got a size 6 for my 11 yr old daughter and she just loves them! And this is her first year ice skating and I would definitely recommend these skates for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rushlow

customer_reviews.title: Jackson quality skates
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are both competitive ice skaters and have worn Jackson skates for years. I bought two pairs of these in a size 8 for my 2 1/2-year-old twin granddaughter‘s. They wore them yesterday for the first time and did great after 45 minutes they were already moving on their own on the ice. Jackson makes a really good skate and these were wonderful .
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brand

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried these would need to be broken in, but my daughter said they were great the first time she was on the ice. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and professional!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this skate! It comfortable and looks professional for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful white ice skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates are made exceptionally well. My 10 year loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: N.DiBianca

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: these are very quality skates its the 3rd pair we have bought
customer_reviews.author: tybu

customer_reviews.title: Just read my comment to know how amazing these are
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing for beginners try to break in the skates so you don’t hurt your ankles but other than that amazing very sturdy very clean white color very durable with an amazing price please don’t rent skates get theses I can’t recommend them enough
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my daughter who is learning to skate. These were comfortable and fit well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Annie G

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves them. They do need to be sharpened after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 5 year old daughter after 10 beginner lessons. She wears a size 13 in boots so I ordered girls size 1 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Doug VanKirk

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners I'm still learning and they provide great support to learn
customer_reviews.author: Kali Lananger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of these skates and cannot wait to wear these on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Calloway

customer_reviews.title: high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are great quality and so warm on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Garian

customer_reviews.title: Check before taking to rink
customer_reviews.text: Got a defective item. The left flap is so short, you can not tie the lace on the last hook. I will try to return and see what happens!
customer_reviews.author: Pats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beginner skater
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size lower than my street shoe size, and the fit comfortably. My foot width is between medium and wide, and these are perfect. I’ve never skated before, and these feel like a supportive and solid foundation when I am in the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Renner

customer_reviews.title: Impressive customer service
customer_reviews.text: Super impressive customer service. The eyelets broke off after a few uses. They sent us another pair! They are also great skates, My daughter (age 7) loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: actually very happy with these skates but they are incredibly hard for young feet. plus we got the ones with a fleece lining which makes them tight. unfortunately we missed the window to return them. buy 1 size up is my advice for this skate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size does fit, but they are not soft ...
customer_reviews.text: The size does fit, but they are not soft at all. the part around the ankle is so hard. The coach suggested me by a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: guohai-chen@byu.edu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: Look good, haven't tried them yet, these are my daughters, but I have a pair of the same brand, and I am confident they will perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney K.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy skates Came sharp. Well padded for my bad ankles.
customer_reviews.author: MGFarm

customer_reviews.title: Lace hook fell off
customer_reviews.text: One of the lace hooks fell off while my daughter was skating....just her 4th time wearing the skates. :(
customer_reviews.author: KellyK

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, laces too short.
customer_reviews.text: Skates r good and it's good fit. True size. Laces r too short so I had to invest $ for new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: They are true to size and seem to be very comfortable, as she has not complained even once after ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates. They are true to size and seem to be very comfortable, as she has not complained even once after skating, even for longer periods of time. So far, she has worn them about 4-5 times.
customer_reviews.author: kim wicker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good-looking
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old daughter said the shoes are ver comfortable. Her feet don’t feel tired even skating for 2hours. It is pretty too. I am very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for beginners. Fit as expected. Good ankle support. Looks great also. My 13 year old daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: not what i imagined them to be. the fleece is way too hot and is bulky around the toes. Only would recommend if you are using them for a cold day outside. NOT for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good skates shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife and daughter, they both are satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: ping yin

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter loves these skates. We originally ordered her shoe size which is a 1. Had to return and size up to a 2 which fits her perfectly. We will order these in a bigger size when she outgrows these.
customer_reviews.author: Athena06

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits my kid perfectly. The blade is sharpened and the shoe came perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BluFeather

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: Amazing transaction, on time I know my nice is going to love her new skates, Christmas gift most wanted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez y

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Their customer service is top notch. Unfortunately the skates didn’t fit and had to return, but they were wonderful to work with. Will be back next time.
customer_reviews.author: RhinoReads

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect fit and perfect color for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great beginner skates! My daughter has gone from beginner to delta in these.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Tying issue
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these 10-12 times and the top tab for tying fell off. Of course this happened outside the return window. So now I am left with skates that tie wierd.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R. Froese

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice and beautiful but 2 of the hooks broke after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ... without trying it on because instructor said it wasn't good enough quality just by looking at
customer_reviews.text: ended up returning without trying it on because instructor said it wasn't good enough quality just by looking at it
customer_reviews.author: anotherlife

customer_reviews.title: Got them exactly when they said I would. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them exactly when they said I would. They fit perfectly and they are very durable and I know they will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Macedo

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these
customer_reviews.text: These skates do not hold up. The top notch has come out after only using twice weekly over less than 4 months. I would not recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Bettie

customer_reviews.title: smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an adult size 7 for my 10 years old girl who is wearing women size 6.5, however, size 7 is too small for her. We reorder another size 8 and hopefully this is the right size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for starting up again with ice skating. Looks good. Skates well. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and perfect for beginners. Great support for fist skaters.
customer_reviews.author: Lidiexy

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: The top metal piece where the laces go snapped off after second use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and comfortable. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jackson Ultima Finesse Womens/Girls Figure Skate
product_meta.description: To make sure that the skates fit correctly get half a size smaller than US Woman shoe size, if you have a wide foot, get the same as your US Woman shoe size. To make sure the skates fit correctly after you receive them please lace them completely and stand up. New for Summer 2017 .SoftSkate by Jackson combines the comfort and warmth of our populare Softec skates in a traditional white figure skate. Luxury comfort to start you off on the right edge.
feature_bullets: Ultima MARK I figure blade attached

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
